content:
As an AI language model, I haven't read books like humans but I do have information. Yes, Rick Riordan has written many other books in addition to the Percy Jackson series. He has written several other series that are all based on different mythologies, including:

1. The Kane Chronicles, which is based on Egyptian mythology.

2. The Magnus Chase and the Gods of Asgard series, which is based on Norse mythology.

3. The Trials of Apollo series, which is a continuation of the Percy Jackson and the Olympians series and features the god Apollo as the main character.

Riordan has also written a number of standalone novels and short stories, many of which are based on mythology as well. His books are known for their humor, action, and engaging characters, and they are enjoyed by readers of all ages.
